attributes.action: Ban use of loudspeakers outside mosques as they cause unnecessary noise-pollution and energy-waste.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain is traditionally a quiet country.
Muslims form less than 3% of a democracy where majority should rule.
Most people would have wrist-watches and purpose-made 5-alarm-prayer-clocks have been available for at least 20 years.
Loudspeakers outside mosques are therefore redundant and they cause unnecessary noise-pollution.
This may constitute Public Order Offence. Why do the faithful need reminding? 
Use of loudspeakers outside mosques causes needless energy-waste and is anti-environmental, therefore antisocial.
